special_text:
Tap three untapped creatures you control: Manuela becomes a 5/5 Avatar enchantment creature with haste and indestructible. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](She stops being a planeswalker, but retains her loyalty abilities.)[/i]
[+1]: Put a prowess counter on target creature.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost on a later turn as long as it remains exiled.
[-5]: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
